name: World Design Island
description:
A world design project made for a Webster University course. Within a semester, I learned how to use Unity's terrain tools, and this is the result of that learning and effort.

It is an island with a ominous building sitting at the top. What waits for you inside?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Use W,A,S,D to move and SPACEBAR to jump.

Use the mouse to move the camera around.

Volume Up Please
